comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: Buses no longer run along here, but have to go round Trafalgar Square on the other three sides.  This is pedestrian only.

comment.author: 9003948@N05
comment._content: Interesting that buses actually stood here when taking their layover. The one in front is an independent operator, or 'Pirate' as the General called them. It is going all the way to Waltham Cross and would be in competition with that 29 for much of the way.
